titles.title: To establish a National Commission to investigate the treatment of migrant families and children by the Trump Administration.
National Commission To Investigate the Treatment of Migrant Families and Children Act of 2019
National Commission To Investigate the Treatment of Migrant Families and Children Act of 2019.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committee on Homeland Security, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Citizenship.
